name: Standing Stones
description: Terra's abilities create Standing Stones. As long as any Standing Stones are on the battleground Terra becomes Knockup immune and her Basic Attacks will Slow enemies and deal bonus Basic Attack damage. This Bonus Damage does not trigger item effects. If Terra Shatters any stones she will retain this buff for an additional 3s after all of the stones are gone.
stats: Bonus Damage: 7 (+10% of your magical power)
